name: Spirit of Omen's Awakening: Electro
description:
Character deals +1 DMG and converts Physical DMG to Electro DMG.
Electro DMG taken by this character +2.
Duration (Rounds): 2
descriptionraw: Character <color=#FFFFFFFF>deals +1 DMG</color> and converts $[K100] to $[K104].\n$[K104] taken by this character +2.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>
